name: Smart Senior Living
tag_list: senior-care, senior-housing, retirement-community, assisted-living-community, alzheimers-care, residential-care-facility, elder-living
overview:
Senior Housing and Care Referrals

Smart Senior Living offer FREE assistance in helping families find the RIGHT HOME and the RIGHT CARE for the elderly. Smart Senior Living was founded by Ivy Marcos. Ivy graduated with a B.S. in Medical Technology, licensed as a Clinical Laboratory Scientist by the California Department of Health Services. Ivy has over twelve (12) years of experience in the healthcare industry. vy later realized the need of a company that would find solutions not only to the needs of the seniors and families, but also, to meet the needs of the people that are involved in the care of the elderly. Smart Senior Living was created to offer the highest quality of service in this field through her collections of experiences, values learned, and a committed team with same vision dedicated to serve.

The referral service at Smart Senior Living include: Independent and Assisted Living communities; Residential Care Homes (RCFE, Board and Care); Alzheimerâ€™s / Dementia Care; In-Home Care; and Respite Care or Short Term Stays.
